<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Create team"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/teams/new"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Creates a new team definition that can be used for ticket routing, access control, and membership assignments.

**Prerequisites**
- None.

**Workflow Example**
1. Choose a team name and optional description.
2. [POST /api/v1.0/teams/new](/docs/api/teams/create-team) with `TeamName` (and optional `Description`).
3. Use the returned TeamId to add members via /api/v1.0/teams/\{teamId\}/members/\{userId\}.

**Minimal Required Fields**: `TeamName`.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Request payload for creating or updating a team.","properties":{"TeamName":{"type":"string","description":"Name of the team.","minLength":1},"Description":{"type":"string","description":"Description of the team.","nullable":true},"IsDeleted":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the team is soft-deleted.","default":false}},"required":["TeamName"],"title":"TeamRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
